net.proteusframework.internet.http

Interface RequestContext


  • public interface RequestContext
    Common Request context information for a web request.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hostname getHostname()
      Get the host name for the current request.
      UserAgent getUserAgent()
      Get the UserAgent for the current request.
      Throwable popError()
      Pop an error off of the request context.
      void pushError(Throwable error)
      Push an error onto the request context.

    • Method Detail

      • getHostname

        Hostname getHostname()
                     throws IllegalStateException
        Get the host name for the current request.
        Returns:
        the host name.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not currently processing a request.

      • getUserAgent

        UserAgent getUserAgent()
                       throws IllegalStateException
        Get the UserAgent for the current request.
        Returns:
        the user agent.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not currently processing a request.

      • popError

        Throwable popError()
                   throws IllegalStateException
        Pop an error off of the request context.
        Returns:
        the last error encountered or null.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not currently processing a request.

      • pushError

        void pushError(Throwable error)
               throws IllegalStateException
        Push an error onto the request context.
        Parameters:
        error - an error.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not currently processing a request.
